title: Python for Beginners
description: Learn Python programming fundamentals in 6 weeks with hands-on exercises and projects. Suitable for beginners.

title: Java Programming Mastery
description: Master Java programming in 8 weeks. Build real-world projects and become a proficient Java developer.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Become a web developer from scratch in 12 weeks. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Explore machine learning and data science in 10 weeks. Hands-on projects using Python and libraries.

title: iOS App Development
description: Build iOS apps using Swift and Xcode in 8 weeks. Start from scratch and create your own apps.

title: Android App Development
description: Create Android apps with Kotlin and Android Studio in 9 weeks. Comprehensive hands-on training.

title: JavaScript Development
description: Master front-end and back-end web development with JavaScript in 14 weeks. Real-world projects included.

title: Data Analysis with R
description: Analyze data using R programming in 7 weeks. Gain data analysis skills for your career.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Build blockchain applications with Solidity in 11 weeks. Learn to create secure and decentralized systems.
